#summary Real-world examples of PreNIS use.

Download this example NSI file: [http://www.pixolut.com/prenis/examples.zip Mobux.nsi] to see how easy it is to use PreNIS in your project. 

We use PreNIS as an integral step in the build pipelines we create using [http://sourceforge.net/projects/nant/ nAnt]. 

It means that the entire project is managed from the Visual Studio IDE without the need to modify external files.
